page.title: 19Recreation
page.content: Most of the people in our area take part in recreation activities. Unfortunately the ability to pursue certain sports or other leisure time activities is hampered by the lack of the neccessary facilities. Cowbridge Athletic Club provides facilities for outdoor sports such as rugby, tennis and cricket. The Comprehensive School allows its pitches to be used by local teams but demand for pitches is far greater than the supply. There is no large meeting hall, however a new leisure centre is being built in the Bear Field.There is no public swimming pool in the area. We surveyed the children in our school and the most popular outdoor hobbies were horse riding, cycling and gardening. The main clubs children belonged to were Gym, Brownies and Cubs. Popular indoor sports were squash and ballet.
